title: Does the iPhone SE 2020 support Fortnite? - Quora

response.answer_text: iPhone SE 2020 is capable to handle any mobile game. It can run Fortnite on high settings without any problem. Apple iPhone SE 2020 comes with A13 Bionic chip, which is the fastest processor in any smartphone till now. So don't worry about running games and applications on this device.

All iphone use the same operating system, just tweaked to match the hardware down the generations. The apps may slightly vary depending upon the hardware or elclusivity to a particular generation of iphone. Any 3rd party apps are supposed to be compatible with every iphone if not designed to be specific to one. In short yes. Although, you might not enjoy it very much on a 4.7 inches screen
